Html:
Hi, I am still trying the vew version and struggling with combdiagnosispointer constrain. Here is the error message I got:

Element SV311 cannot contain the value '1:2' because it must be between 1 and 2 characters in length.
Parameter name: SV311

Also, please drop a line for SV1 about how to use combdiagnosispointer sv107 when there are two diagnosis code.

Thanks
Jinpin

I have updated SV107 to be recognized as a string instead of int for composite pointers in version 3.0.7.
I have updated SV311 to have a maxlength of 7 in changset 30923. I will try and release this soon.
Thanks for catching these errors. The definitions are defining the individual components, but I am nor parsing those out when I write it to the database.

You will be able to consistently parse these along as you use the component separator in the ISA segment. Usually it is the colon, but could be something else.
